PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-07112006-07-13,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActOfficial Languages Act
PrecisAppointment of DYANE ADAM of Saint-François-de-l'Île-d'Orléans, Quebec, to hold the office of Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada while that office is vacant until the day on which a Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada is appointed, for a term not exceeding six months, effective August 1, 2006.
